General Race

Check the results of
the dazzling competition once again..

We provide the results of the thrilling speed and intense race.

Confirmed payout odds for each betting type and information on the first, second, and third-place finishers are provided immediately after the race ends. Detailed race records are displayed shortly after the referee's official decision.
